doctor.name: Dr. Md. Rezaul Karim
doctor.specialty: Urology (Kidney, Prostate, Bladder, Urethra) Specialist & Surgeon
doctor.workplace: Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Rezaul Karim is a Urologist in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Surgery), MS (Urology). He is a Assistant Professor & Head, Urology at Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Rezaul Karim at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra is 3pm to 8pm (Sat to Thu) & 11am to 5pm (Friday).
